metadata.title: AI-Enhanced ML-FAANG Mastery Plan
metadata.description: 20-week comprehensive roadmap for ML researchers transitioning to FAANG software engineering roles with AI-powered learning assistance

week.title: Interview Execution & Career Launch
objectives: Execute live interviews with calm confidence and peak performance
Effectively manage multi-stage interview loops and communication
Master the art of offer evaluation and negotiation
Develop a strategic 30-60-90 day plan for a new role
Celebrate the successful completion of the mastery plan and career transition

morning_session.title: Interview Day Warm-up
activities: Execute your pre-interview warm-up routine.
Solve one 'Easy' LeetCode problem (e.g., Two Sum) to get in the zone.
Use AI for a 5-minute confidence-building visualization exercise.

problems.name: Live Interview Slot 1
problems.description: Focus on clear communication, thinking out loud, and asking clarifying questions. The goal is a strong, positive interaction.

evening_session.title: Post-Interview Debrief
activities: Write down notes from the interview: questions asked, your performance, things you learned.
Send a concise, professional thank-you note to your interviewers.
Use AI to analyze your performance and identify any patterns.

morning_session.title: System Design Review
activities: Quickly review 3 common system design patterns (e.g., Caching, Load Balancing, Sharding).
Whiteboard a high-level design for a service like Instagram.
Practice explaining the trade-offs of your design choices.

problems.name: Live Interview Slot 2
problems.description: If it's a system design round, focus on structure: requirements, estimation, API, data model, high-level design, deep dive.

evening_session.title: Post-Interview Debrief & Rest
activities: Debrief today's interview, noting any new or interesting questions.
Follow up with recruiters as needed.
Take the rest of the evening off to decompress.

morning_session.title: Behavioral Story Polish
activities: Review your top 5 STAR stories.
Use an AI partner to practice delivering one story, asking for feedback on tone and impact.
Prepare thoughtful questions to ask about company culture and team dynamics.

problems.name: Live Interview Slot 3
problems.description: For behavioral rounds, be authentic, structured (STAR), and connect your experiences to the company's values or leadership principles.

evening_session.title: Managing Interview Fatigue
activities: Reflect on your energy levels throughout the process.
Develop a quick 'reset' routine to use between back-to-back interviews.
Plan a non-technical activity to recharge.

morning_session.title: Negotiation Strategy
activities: Research average salaries for your target role, level, and location.
Use AI to learn about the components of a tech offer (base, equity, bonus).
Prepare your 'BATNA' (Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement).

problems.name: Offer Evaluation & Negotiation Practice
problems.description: Use an AI to simulate an offer call from a recruiter. Practice expressing gratitude, asking clarifying questions, and presenting a well-reasoned counter-offer.

evening_session.title: Decision Making
activities: Create a scorecard to compare potential offers across multiple factors (comp, team, growth, WLB).
Discuss your options with a mentor or trusted peer.
Trust your gut and make a decision you're excited about.

morning_session.title: Roadmap Retrospective
activities: Look back at your Week 1 goals and notes.
Write down the three most valuable skills you learned.
Acknowledge how much you've grown throughout this intensive process.

problems.name: Contribute Back to the Community
problems.description: Write a post on LinkedIn or a blog sharing one key insight from your interview prep journey. Help those who are just getting started.

evening_session.title: Celebrate Your Success!
activities: You've completed the ML-FAANG Mastery Plan!
Celebrate this incredible achievement with friends, family, or a well-deserved personal reward.
Get ready for your new career adventure!

saturday.title: Design Your 30-60-90 Day Plan
saturday.description: Strategically plan your first three months in your new role to ensure a fast start and long-term success. This plan will be your personal roadmap for making an impact, building relationships, and learning effectively.
tasks: **First 30 Days (Learn):** Define goals for understanding the team's codebase, tools, and processes. Schedule 1-on-1s with every team member.
**First 60 Days (Contribute):** Identify goals for completing your first project, making meaningful code contributions, and understanding the team's architecture.
**First 90 Days (Own):** Set goals for taking ownership of a small feature or component, providing value in team meetings, and establishing your reputation as a reliable engineer.
Use AI to refine your plan and add specific, measurable metrics for each goal.
saturday.deliverable: A one-page document outlining your 30-60-90 day plan for your new role.

sunday.title: Prepare for Day 1
sunday.description: Final preparations for a successful start to your new job. This is about logistics and mindset, ensuring you walk in on your first day feeling prepared, confident, and excited.
tasks: Confirm all HR paperwork is complete.
Prepare your home office or commute plan.
Relax and get a great night's sleep, ready to start the next chapter of your career.
sunday.deliverable: A state of complete readiness and excitement for your new role.
